scripts.build:peter: cd sites/peterszerzo-com && elm-app build && cp build/index.html build/200.html && cd ../../sketches && node build.js
scripts.build:anna: cd sites/annacingi-com && elm-app build && cp build/index.html build/200.html
scripts.deploy:peter: npm run build:peter && surge sites/peterszerzo-com/build peterszerzo.com
scripts.deploy:anna: npm run build:anna && surge sites/annacingi-com/build annacingi.com
